027package dev.metaschema.oscal.tools.cli.core;
028
029import dev.metaschema.core.util.IVersionInfo;
030
031/**
032 * Provides version information for this application.
033 */
034public class OscalCliVersion implements IVersionInfo {
035
036  private static final String NAME = "oscal-cli";
037  private static final String BUILD_VERSION = "3.0.0";
038  private static final String BUILD_TIMESTAMP = "2026-01-12 04:18";
039  private static final String COMMIT = "6bdf6bc";
040  private static final String BRANCH = "6bdf6bcb08a0c6cb52531d36da794a11fb5602d8";
041  private static final String CLOSEST_TAG = "";
042  private static final String ORIGIN = "https://github.com/metaschema-framework/oscal-cli";
043
044  @Override
045  public String getName() {
046    return NAME;
047  }
048
049  @Override
050  public String getVersion() {
051    return BUILD_VERSION;
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public String getBuildTimestamp() {
056    return BUILD_TIMESTAMP;
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public String getGitOriginUrl() {
061    return ORIGIN;
062  }
063
064  @Override
065  public String getGitCommit() {
066    return COMMIT;
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public String getGitBranch() {
071    return BRANCH;
072  }
073
074  @Override
075  public String getGitClosestTag() {
076    return CLOSEST_TAG;
077  }
078}
